author: bruno
msg: formatting date convertor: added support for a new attribute timeStyle to be able to configure the time style preference (short, medium, ...) separate from the date style.

author: sichen
msg: OFBIZ-628:  Revert product category lookup change in EditProduct form.  This is a dropdown of categories that the product is associated with, not a lookup.  Thanks to Guido Amarilla for pointing this out.

msg: Fixed typo in client/AMQSession.java from last checkin
